conbody.p: You can monitor disk usage in the EDW by running one of the EDW System reports, available as part of the Foundation Analytics report package. For more information, see following reports in the Analytics Guide.

ul.li: EDW System Disk Space Usage Alerts in “Foundation Analytics Report Package”
EDW System Disk Usage Per Node in “Foundation Analytics Report Package”
EDW Percent Disk Space Usage in “Foundation Analytics Report Package” For details on running these reports, see the SenSage AP Analyzer documentation.

conbody.p: For details on running these reports, see the SenSage AP Analyzer documentation.
